name: Lastfm.js
tagline: Displays the last song you scrobbled on Last.FM on a webpage
body:
# [lastFM.js](https://pschfr.github.io/LastFM.js) Uses JavaScript to fetch the most recently listened to tracks that I scrobble from [Last.FM](http://www.last.fm/) 1. Get an API key from [Last.FM](http://www.last.fm/api/account/create). 3. Put the API key and your username in lastFM.js. 4. Place a `
` wherever in your HTML. 5. Done. Go enjoy some tunes. ### TODO: 1. display more [methods](http://www.last.fm/api) 2. fix duplicate track problem 3. auto-refresh doesn't seem to work right?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
